alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:27PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Louisa and Fluvanna Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1027 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Monticello, or 7 miles south of Charlottesville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lake Monticello around 1050 PM EDT. Troy around 1100 PM EDT. Palmyra around 1105 PM EDT. Fork Union around 1110 PM EDT. Columbia, Kents Store and Ferncliff around 1115 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Dixie, Nahor, Stage Junction, Zion Crossroads, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Antioch, Union Mills, Wildwood and Bybee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
